backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing Valentine-related features, target files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text summaries describing the purpose of each major frontend file in the Valentine flow.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables defining the romantic light/dark theme.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/valentine.html: Standalone Valentine HTML page with evasive No button and celebration view revealing the meme image and love letter.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React Valentine flow with evasive No button logic and a celebration screen showing the meme image and love letter.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing a backend actor based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Comprehensive Internet Identity auth provider and hook managing identity loading, login, and state transitions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder hook for backend queries not used in this app.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and theme variables for light/dark modes, plus global styles and small utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider, then renders App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color variables, typography, container queries, animations, and extended theme options.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature descriptions, and requirements for building the Valentine-themed web app.
